title: Support main needed to run unconventional bot lane.
body:
Need someone willing to try a strategy with me seriously and not take it as troll. Anyone crazy as I am, and also competent?

Solo queue has failed me, statistically it hasnt, Im positive w/l, but should be much higher win-rate doing this, so i want to get coordinated about it.

replies.body: invite me, im down to play kill bot lanes
cant really join you in your endeavors, but im curious about the "unconventional" part
